Articles.Content:
KERBAL 1 is my first eva orbit reaching space plane w/ only NovaSilsko\'s Vanguard Shuttle and Stock parts attached here r some screenshots

BTW WE CRSHLANDED INTO THE SEA AT THE COST OF THE NOSECONE !

just to mention the next ship Kerbal 2 will be upgraded for a possible Mun landing w/ landing legs more engines and a possible link to a base btw

Nice craft, but the name is very, very generic. Also, frontier is spelled wrong in your signature. You say that it 'is my first eva orbit reaching space plane.' Do you know what EVA means? Because that ain\'t it.
I know what EVA means I just put \'ever\' in shorthand

Not putting things in 'shorthand' will get you a long way here. Anyway, it\'s a nice launch vehicle, very spartan. What\'s the Apoapsis and Periapsis of your orbit? Good luck on your Kerbal 2 as well! Also, about the name... It\'s like calling an IRL rocket 'Human 1.'

Not putting things in 'shorthand' will get you a long way here. Anyway, it\'s a nice launch vehicle, very spartan. What\'s the Apoapsis and Periapsis of your orbit? Good luck on your Kerbal 2 as well! Also, about the name... It\'s like calling an IRL rocket 'Human 1.'

Kerbal 2 crashed

Not putting things in 'shorthand' will get you a long way here. Anyway, it\'s a nice launch vehicle, very spartan. What\'s the Apoapsis and Periapsis of your orbit? Good luck on your Kerbal 2 as well! Also, about the name... It\'s like calling an IRL rocket 'Human 1.'

talking in good grammar makes me wet, call me.

talking in good grammar makes me wet, call me.

I agree dude lolz
Every time i crash into the sea it costs me a lot more than just a nosecone. Well played sir, well played! I see the Gramma police have paid you a visit as well, careful or you get a ticket!
